Friday’s TV Talk

12:07 a.m. EST November 27, 2014
CONNECT 2 TWEETLINKEDINCOMMENTEMAILMORE

7 a.m. (ABC) Good Morning America Television chef Emeril Lagasse shares ideas for turning leftover Thanksgiving food into new dishes; actor Jeffrey Wright from “Hunger Games: Mockingjay-Part 1.” (New)

7:00 (NBC) Today “Best Buys on Black Friday”; Garth Brooks. (N)

9:00 (CBS) The Ellen DeGeneres Show Actor Shia LaBeouf.

9:00 (FOX) LIVE! With Kelly and Michael Craig Ferguson; Diane von Furstenberg. (N)

10:00 (ABC) The Doctors Viewers share stories about how one of the 1,000 episodes of the show provided information that saved their lives.

10:00 (CBS) Steve Harvey “Ask Steve Anonymous.”

10:00 (CW) The Wendy Williams Show Actress and heiress Paris Hilton talks about her perfume fragrance “With Love.” (N)

11:00 (ABC) The View Television writer Norman Lear. (N)

2 p.m. (FOX) The Dr. Oz Show Theresa Caputo, who claims to be a medium.

4:00 (NBC) The Queen Latifah Show Actor Laurence Fishburne from “Black-ish.”

11:35 (ABC) Jimmy Kimmel Live English boy band One Direction.

11:35 (CBS) Late Show With David Letterman Actor Michael Keaton; rock music group Foo Fighters performs with musicians Ann and Nancy Wilson of Heart.

11:35 (NBC) The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon Actor Bradley Cooper.

Midnight (KET2) Tavis Smiley Jazz musician Al Jarreau. (N)

12:37 a.m. (CBS) The Late Late Show With Craig Ferguson “2 Broke Girls” actress Kat Dennings; comic Jermaine Fowler performs stand-up. (N)

12:37 (NBC) Late Night With Seth Meyers Actor Martin Short.

1:37 (NBC) Last Call With Carson Daly Actor Wyatt Cenac.
